column6: there was an incident with a tourist bus on National Road 5
column11: from company BP East Asia was travelling from Battambang to Phnom Penh when it collided with another vehicle
column12: which escaped from the scene.------A 28 year old man from Pursat died
column13: and at least three more people
column15: were seriously injured.------The victims were taken to the local hospital and the bus was sent to the traffic office.------Warning
